author: samcm
content:
Does Nimbus not support the new `data_column_sidecar` event on devnet-2?

```
 curl https://REDACTED@bn.nimbus-geth-1.fusaka-devnet-2.ethpandaops.io/eth/v1/events\?topics\=data_column_sidecar -H "accept: text/event-stream"

{"code":400,"message":"Invalid topics value","stacktraces":["Incorrect event's topic value"]}%
```

author: jtraglia
content: I'm preparing to make the consensus-specs alpha.3 release for devnet-3. Before doing this, I'd like to confirm that we're not missing anything. Are we? https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/fusaka-devnet-3

author: pk910
content:
There was a issue in spamoor. 
basically the goroutine that should process receipts and confirmations panicked, so no more transactions were confirmed from spamoors point of view.
latest master version is fixed now, and testing on fusaka-devnet-2.
